languages.text: {n}Тонкие пальцы женщины скользят по приборной панели между сотнями проводов и кабелей. Щелкая многочисленными переборками и переключателями, Мастер вокса посылает команды и поочередно настраивает связь с экипажем на разных палубах. Наконец танец ее рук среди шума помех, треска вокса и мигающих огней переключателей завершается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Тонкие пальцы женщины скользят по приборной панели между сотнями проводов и кабелей. Щелкая многочисленными переборками и переключателями, Мастер Вокса посылает команды и поочередно настраивает связь с экипажем на разных палубах. Наконец танец ее рук среди шума помехов, треска вокса и мигающих огней переключателей завершается.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The Vox Master's thin fingers dart between hundreds of wires and cables on the control panel. Flipping switches and turning dials, she issues commands and methodically checks the lines of communication with the crew on every deck. At last, accompanied by the sound of static, the crackling of the vox, and the flickering of signalling lights, the dance of her hands concludes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Тонкие пальцы женщины скользят по приборной панели между сотнями проводов и кабелей. Щелкая многочисленными переборками и переключателями, Мастер вокса посылает команды и поочередно настраивает связь с экипажем на разных палубах. Наконец танец ее рук среди шума помех, треска вокса и мигающих огней переключателей завершается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Her thin fingers are darting around the control panel between hundreds of wires and cables. The Vox Master is flicking dozens of knobs and switches, issuing commands, and methodically checking communication with the crew on every deck. At last, accompanied by the sound of static, the crackling of the vox, and the flickering of signal lights, her hands conclude their dance.{/n}

The Vox Master is flicking dozens of knobs and switches, issuing commands, and methodically checking communication with the crew on every deck. At last, accompanied by the sound of static, the crackling of the vox, and the flickering of signal lights, her hands conclude their dance.{/n}

At last, accompanied by the sound of static, crackling of the vox, and flickering of signalling lights, the dance of her hands concludes.{/n}

At last, accompanied by the sound of static, the crackling of the vox, and the flickering of signalling lights, the dance of her hands concludes.{/n}

{n}The Vox Master's thin fingers dart between hundreds of wires and cables on the control panel. Flipping switches and turning dials, she issues commands and methodically checks the lines of communication with the crew on every deck. At last, accompanied by the sound of static, the crackling of the vox, and the flickering of signalling lights, the dance of her hands concludes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les doigts fins de la maîtresse-vox volent parmi les centaines de câbles du panneau de commandes. Tout en actionnant des interrupteurs et en tournant des boutons, elle lance des commandes et vérifie méthodiquement les liens de communication avec l'équipage de tous les ponts. Enfin, dans un crachotement de sons parasites, du crépitement du vox et sous les clignotements de divers voyants, ses mains cessent leur manège.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master's thin fingers dart between hundreds of wires and cables on the control panel. Flipping switches and turning dials, she issues commands and methodically checks the lines of communication with the crew on every deck. At last, accompanied by the sound of static, the crackling of the vox, and the flickering of signalling lights, the dance of her hands concludes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ses doigts fins volent parmi les centaines de câbles du panneau de commandes. La maîtresse-vox actionne des dizaines d'interrupteurs, tourne des boutons, active des commandes et vérifie méthodiquement les liens de communication avec l'équipage de tous les ponts. Enfin, dans un crachotement de sons parasites et sous les clignotements de divers voyants, ses mains cessent leur manège.{/n}

languages.text: {n}音阵大师瘦削的手指在控制面板的数百根电线与电缆之间穿梭。她打开几十个开关，转动旋钮，发出命令，有条不紊地检查与每层甲板船员的通讯联系。最后，音阵系统发出噼啪的声响。伴随着静电声与信号灯的闪烁，她双手编织的舞蹈结束了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master's thin fingers dart between hundreds of wires and cables on the control panel. Flipping switches and turning dials, she issues commands and methodically checks the lines of communication with the crew on every deck. At last, accompanied by the sound of static, the crackling of the vox, and the flickering of signalling lights, the dance of her hands concludes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵大师瘦削的手指在控制面板的数百根电线与电缆之间穿梭。她打开几十个开关，转动旋钮，发出命令，有条不紊地检查与每层甲板船员的通讯联系。最后，音阵系统发出噼啪的声响。伴随着静电声与信号灯的闪烁，她双手编织的舞蹈结束了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die dünnen Finger der Voxmeisterin huschen zwischen hunderten von Kabeln und Drähten auf dem Bedienfeld herum. Während sie Schalter umlegt und Wählscheiben dreht, erteilt sie Befehle und prüft die Kommunikationsleitungen mit den Crews auf allen Decks. Schließlich endet der Tanz ihrer Hände, begleitet von einem Rauschen, dem Knistern des Vox-Systems und dem Flackern von Lichtern.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master's thin fingers dart between hundreds of wires and cables on the control panel. Flipping switches and turning dials, she issues commands and methodically checks the lines of communication with the crew on every deck. At last, accompanied by the sound of static, the crackling of the vox, and the flickering of signalling lights, the dance of her hands concludes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ihre dünnen Finger huschen zwischen hunderten von Kabeln und Drähten auf dem Bedienfeld herum. Die Voxmeisterin legt Dutzende von Schaltern um, dreht an Knöpfen, erteilt Befehle und überprüft methodisch Kommunikationsverbindungen mit der Crew auf sämtlichen Decks. Schließlich endet der Tanz ihrer Hände, begleitet von einem Rauschen, dem Knistern des Vox-Systems und dem Flackern von Lichtern.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los finos dedos de la maestra de vocos se mueven frenéticamente entre los cientos de cables y conexiones del panel de control. La maestra de vocos acciona una docena de interruptores, gira manijas, da órdenes y revisa metódicamente los enlaces de comunicación con la tripulación de cada cubierta. Finalmente, acompañada del sonido de las interferencias, el crujido del voco y el parpadeo de las luces de señalización, concluye su danza de manos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master's thin fingers dart between hundreds of wires and cables on the control panel. Flipping switches and turning dials, she issues commands and methodically checks the lines of communication with the crew on every deck. At last, accompanied by the sound of static, the crackling of the vox, and the flickering of signalling lights, the dance of her hands concludes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sus finos dedos se mueven frenéticamente entre los cientos de cables y conexiones del panel de control. La maestra de voco acciona una docena de interruptores, gira manijas, da órdenes y revisa metódicamente los enlaces de comunicación con la tripulación de cada cubierta. Finalmente, acompañada del sonido de las interferencias, el crujido del voco y el parpadeo de las luces de señalización, concluye su danza de manos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヴォクスマスターの細い指が、制御盤の何百ものワイヤーやケーブルの間を素早く移動する。彼女はスイッチを切り替え、ノブを回し、コマンドを出し、デッキごとのクルーとの通信線を整然と確認する。そしてようやく、静電気の音、ヴォクスのパチパチと鳴る音、信号灯の点滅と共に、彼女の手のダンスが終了した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master's thin fingers dart between hundreds of wires and cables on the control panel. Flipping switches and turning dials, she issues commands and methodically checks the lines of communication with the crew on every deck. At last, accompanied by the sound of static, the crackling of the vox, and the flickering of signalling lights, the dance of her hands concludes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォクスマスターの細い指が、制御盤の何百ものワイヤーやケーブルの間を素早く移動する。彼女はスイッチを切り替え、ノブを回し、コマンドを出し、デッキごとのクルーとの通信線を整然と確認する。そしてようやく、静電気の音、ヴォクスのパチパチと鳴る音、信号灯の点滅と共に、彼女の手のダンスが終了した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Voks Üstadı'nın ince parmakları, kontrol panelindeki yüzlerce tel ve kablo arasında gidip geliyor. Tuşlara basıp düğmeleri çeviriyor, komutlar verip metodik bir şekilde bütün güvertelerdeki mürettebatın iletişim hatlarını kontrol ediyor. Nihayetinde parazit sesi, voks tıkırtısı ve yanıp sönen işaret ışıkları eşliğinde, ellerinin bu dansı sona eriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master's thin fingers dart between hundreds of wires and cables on the control panel. Flipping switches and turning dials, she issues commands and methodically checks the lines of communication with the crew on every deck. At last, accompanied by the sound of static, the crackling of the vox, and the flickering of signalling lights, the dance of her hands concludes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Voks Üstadı'nın ince parmakları, kontrol panelindeki yüzlerce tel ve kablo arasında gidip geliyor. Tuşlara basıyor ve düğmeleri çeviriyor, komutlar veriyor ve metodik bir şekilde bütün güvertelerdeki mürettebat üyelerinin iletişim hatlarını kontrol ediyor. Nihayetinde parazit sesi, voks tıkırtısı ve yanıp sönen işaret ışıkları eşliğinde, ellerinin bu dansı sona eriyor.{/n}
